title: An Act relative to modernizing the unemployment benefits online portal

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Vaughn of Wrentham, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2187) of Marcus S. Vaughn that the Department of Unemployment Assistance online unemployment benefits portal have a status bar on every individual’s profile displaying the progress of the applicant’s claim.  Labor and Workforce Development.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Labor and Workforce Development

related_entities.name: committee on Labor and Workforce Development

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 10/08/2025 from 10:00 AM-5:00 PM in B-1
Hearing rescheduled to 10/08/2025 from 10:00 AM-12:15 PM in B-1                                            and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
